Author: whooptidooo
Text: I'm so happy it's not as bad as you thought it'd be!!! ðŸ’•  I'm still not brave enough to measure or weigh myself after the last couple of weeks. But I'm trying to stay on track again now, it's already Monday afternoon where I live and I'm sipping on a black coffee with ice and hoping to not eat all day.  If you need someone to be accountable to, I'm here and going through the same thing. Good luck! Hope you have a great week!
